overview: A bold and brash statement on love, passion, and the penetration of hope. Jess and Elton engage in a captivating match of brains, brawn, and bodily fluids. Will Jess demonstrate why he's known as the Sphincter Shredder? Or will Elton prove there's more power to his bottom than meets the eye? This is one swordfight you WON'T want to miss!
title: The Pooper Scene
